subject: Join us for a free branding workshop tomorrow
body:
VIEW IN BROWSER 
View in Your Browser
 
GROW AS A MENTEE 
BECOME A MENTOR 
EMPOWER TEAMS 
 
It's not too late to register!
Join us tomorrow for our free webinar:
Grow Your Brand with Keith Allen West
 
Date
: March 19th
Time
: 11am MT 
Location
: Zoom
Your brand isn’t your colours or your logo; it’s a perception that’s formed by the experiences and interactions someone has with you. 
When you’re intentional about your online (and offline!) presence, you can shape that perception and align it to your goals, while being authentically and uniquely you.
A solid personal brand will help you:
Earn promotions
Nail interviews
Land client projects
Grow an audience online of more than 250,000 people
Seriously increase your income
Build a network of talented mentors you can lean on for support and advice
GROW YOUR BRAND 
 
Keith Allen West is a branding expert, boutique social media influencer, blogger, public speaker and an actor. He is known for his energetic presentations on real world branding and public relations for small business success.
West spends his time between Los Angeles (CA), Savannah (GA), and Albuquerque (NM) when not traveling globally promoting scenic destinations, luxurious hotels, fashion/beauty brands, and the entertainment industry. 
 
He’s been featured in People Magazine, USA Today, VOGUE, Huffington Post, The Guardian, LA Times, NY Times, FOX, CNN, AOL, MSN, NPR and many more media outlets. His small business reality series THE STARTUP on AOL Small Business reached 24 million subscribers. 
 
West has reached the Inc. 500/5000 list with two of his cosmetics companies by growing revenue over 1,000%. Urban Fresh Cosmetics sales ballooned from $200,000 to $5.1 million in just three years. He consults with other quality brands to grow their sales with his trusted methods.
REGISTER 
 
 
 
 
 
HAVE QUESTIONS? VIEW FAQ. 
LISTEN IN: PODCASTS 
THE REAL MENTORS BLOG 
LOGIN TO YOUR ACCOUNT 
No longer want to receive these emails?
 
Unsubscribe
.

subject: Let’s Start the New Year with National Mentoring Month!
body:
VIEW IN BROWSER 
View in Your Browser
 
GROW AS A MENTEE 
BECOME A MENTOR 
EMPOWER TEAMS 
 
HAPPY NEW YEAR! 🎉
As we begin 2025, we’re excited to announce that January is officially 
National Mentoring Month
! This month, we’ll be highlighting the incredible impact that mentorship can have on both mentors and mentees and we invite you to join us in celebrating and growing this powerful community.
NATIONAL MENTORING MONTH
January is all about celebrating the exchange of knowledge and wisdom. 
National Mentoring Month 
is the perfect time to reflect on the value of mentorship and explore how both mentors and mentees benefit from these powerful relationships. Whether you’re starting your mentoring journey or deepening your existing connections, this month offers opportunities for growth and learning for everyone involved.
DATES TO CELEBRATE MENTORING THIS MONTH
January 7th:
 I Am A Mentor Day
January 17th:
 International Mentoring Day
January 21: 
Thank Your Mentor Day
January 31st: Webinar Registration Opens
: Don’t miss the opportunity to sign up for Real Mentors Network’s first webinar in March with featured mentor, Keith West!
MENTOR FEATURE: KEITH WEST
We’re excited to feature Keith West, one of our outstanding mentors, in this month’s newsletter! Keith will be hosting his very first webinar Wednesday, March 19th at 11 am MT, where he’ll share insights on creating personal branding. We are thrilled to have him as part of our network and can’t wait for you to hear from him.
Keith Allen West is a branding expert, boutique social media influencer, blogger, public speaker and an actor. He is known for his energetic presentations on real world branding and public relations for small business success.
 
West spends his time between Los Angeles (CA), Savannah (GA), and Albuquerque (NM) when not traveling globally promoting scenic destinations, luxurious hotels, fashion/beauty brands, and the entertainment industry. 
 
He’s been featured in People Magazine, USA Today, VOGUE, Huffington Post, The Guardian, LA Times, NY Times, FOX, CNN, AOL, MSN, NPR and many more media outlets. His small business reality series THE STARTUP on AOL Small Business reached 24 million subscribers. 
 
West has reached the Inc. 500/5000 list with two of his cosmetics companies by growing revenue over 1,000%. Urban Fresh Cosmetics sales ballooned from $200,000 to $5.1 million in just three years. He consults with other quality brands to grow their sales with his trusted methods.
 
BECOME A MENTOR 
PODCAST FEATURE
If you haven’t already, be sure to check out our podcast series Making Connections, starting with 
Episode 1
: Mentoring Origins and Evolution
.
 
In this episode, we chat with Bob Harvey, the author of Chapter 1 in 
Making Connections: A Handbook for Effective Formal Mentoring Programs in Academia
.  Not in Academia? Not to worry, this podcast discusses the concepts that are applicable in the corporate world as well!
 
 
MENTORING TIP OF THE MONTH
Mentoring Relationships
One of the most effective ways to ensure a successful mentoring relationship is by setting clear expectations from the start - whether you’re a mentor or mentee. This includes defining the goals of the mentorship, how often you’ll meet, and what you hope to accomplish. Clear communication sets the foundation for a strong, productive relationship that benefits everyone.
Mentoring Programs
When establishing a mentoring program, start by 
creating a clear definition of mentoring 
and its key elements: its purpose, who it is for, the skills required, and its ultimate goals. A well-defined framework ensures alignment, sets clear expectations, and maximizes the program’s impact for both mentors and mentees.
READY TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE? REGISTER TO BE A MENTOR!
 
The world needs mentors like you. Are you ready to share your wisdom, offer guidance, and help someone navigate their journey? Sign up today to become a mentor and make a lasting impact on someone’s life and career.
START YOUR JOURNEY 
Thank you for being a part of this community and for considering how you can pay it forward through mentorship. We look forward to seeing the incredible connections we’ll make together this year!
 
 
 
 
 
HAVE QUESTIONS? VIEW FAQ. 
LISTEN IN: PODCASTS 
THE REAL MENTORS BLOG 
LOGIN TO YOUR ACCOUNT 
No longer want to receive these emails?
 
Unsubscribe
.

subject: Why do it?
body:
Here are just 5 reasons why you should
 
 
5 Reasons to Become a Mentor
Being a mentor fills my cup. In part, because I have had so many incredible mentors that have helped me make difficult decisions throughout my career. Too often, folks feel like they have to go it alone, but they don't.
Mentors make a difference.
Here are just 5 of the benefits to joining the Real Mentors Network:
Mentorship opens doors to fulfilled learning and growth as well as advanced opportunities. 
Professionals with mentors are more likely to be promoted than those who don’t. 
Mentorship is not only a key factor in retaining talent from under- or unrepresented communities, but a powerful way to address systemic inequities that keep BIPOC talent stuck, unfulfilled, and disengaged. 
Studies have shown that mentoring is a more impactful diversity and inclusion strategy than standard corporate training.
Real Mentors bridge the gap with impactful and inclusive mentorship driven from authentic connections.
 
There is NO IMMEDIATE TIME COMMITMENT and YOU control your availability.
Become a Mentor
 
 
Got questions? Visit our 
FAQ page
 
for more information about being a mentor or mentee.
 
 
 
 
 
Copyright © 2023 Tamara Thorpe, All rights reserved.

subject: I owe you an apology
body:
I try not to apologize but thank people for being patient but this time
 
 
I Have a Big Announcement
I try not to make apologies, but rather thank people for their patience but this time I've got a very good reason for my absence. I have been channeling all of my time into a new business initiative, 
Real Mentors Network
.
On October 27
th
, National Mentoring Day, I will be launching the 
Real Mentors Network
, an online mentoring platform that uses an insight-driven algorithm for matching professionals in order to promote leadership and growth.
Conceptualized in 2012, I took the audacious step in 2020 to bring this vision to life. Now, just 3 years later, my vision for a place and space for professionals to have greater and more equitable access to mentors is a reality.
And I want you to be one of the many incredible professionals to become a mentor in the Real Mentors Network. 
Complete your profile here
!
The only requirement is a calendar scheduling link (Calendly, Google, Acuity, etc) and desire to share your experience and expertise. 
We’d love to have your profile up by Friday!
If you have any questions or problems building profile, send an SOS to info@realmentors.net.
More questions?
What if I don’t have a Calendly account?
Calendly is free and easy, and gives you the most control over your availability for mentoring. With Calendly, 
YOU
 decide what days/times you are available to mentor, and a Calendly link makes it easy for a Mentee to schedule time with you when they’re ready. No more going back and forth via email trying to find the best spot. 
Here are some video tutorials
What if I don’t have a lot of time?
You're in the driver's seat; you determine how much time you can commit, even if it is an hour per month, your mentoring can have a huge impact. By setting up a Calendly account, you can be as narrow or expansive as you need to be with your availability.
 
This is a beta launch so while we get this going, we are not anticipating a large number of mentees in year one, but enough to test the system and marketplace. In fact, we don’t anticipate much activity for the first couple of months. But, again, you decide how much time you have to help.
 
How many people am I expected to mentor?
 
Right now, we are front loading Mentors into the system, so that Mentees have more choices, more access to our great Mentors.
 
The network is launching October 27, 2023. As this gets rolling, you may or may not have anyone reach out right away. 
 
Am I ready to be a mentor?
 
If you haven’t knowingly mentored before, this could be an intimidating invitation. But you have received this invitation because in some way or another you have been a mentor to me or I’ve seen you mentor others.
 
The platform algorithm is designed to match you other adult professionals who are in need of what you have to offer and align with your availability.
 Thank you for joining the Real Mentors Network, your support for me and future mentees is so greatly appreciated.
Tamara
  
 
What's the difference between a mentor and coach?
Not sure about being a mentor? Join me for a conversation with Ben Cross, founder of LOVE + RELO and leader in the global mobility industry. We had a great "learning" conversation, discussing the power of mentoring and how mentors are different from coaches. I also shared tips for the delicate process of ending a mentoring relationship. 
LISTEN NOW
!
 
Got questions? Visit our 
FAQ page
 
for more information about being a mentor or mentee.
 
 
 
 
 
Copyright © 2023 Tamara Thorpe, All rights reserved.

subject: A message from BILL CEO and Founder
body:
An update on our response to the Silicon Valley Bank (SVB) events.
  
 
 
 
Dear valued customers,
I wanted to update you on our response to the Silicon Valley Bank (SVB) events. Our top priority is to support our customers. In the days since events unfolded, we have been processing pending transactions, and I'm happy to report that all SVB-related outstanding payments have been processed, and we're fully back to business as usual for payment processing.
On Monday, we announced 
new programs
 to help customers stay operational, including BILL balance, Divvy, BILL Pay by Card, invoice financing for your vendors on the BILL network, and extended payment terms for Divvy account holders impacted by SVB.
We have scaled up our support capabilities to meet increased demand and are here to help. If your business needs support, please don't hesitate to 
contact us
.
Thank you to those who have provided open communication and feedback during this stressful time. We value your trust and transparent partnerships. The BILL team will continue to work hard every day to honor that trust.
René
  
  
  
 
 
 
 
 
View as Webpage
   
Privacy Policy
   
Terms & Conditions
   
Unsubscribe
 
Bill.com, LLC • 6220 America Center Drive, San Jose, CA 95002

subject: 📮 Don't miss out on curated DEI content!
body:
Opt in to our emails by January 16.

Curate Your DEI Content
Dear Amir,
Happy New Year! We’d love to stay in touch about your DEI journey and the exciting LCW content we have planned for 2023. Here’s a sneak peek of what’s to come:
A brand-new podcast season featuring personal stories about workplace inclusion
Timely webinars designed to upskill cultural competence throughout the year
Thought leadership pieces to spark brave conversations on diverse teams
To opt in to curated email updates, please fill out our mailing preferences survey by 
January 16
—
if we don’t hear from you by then, you will be removed from our mailing system.

Take Survey
We hope that 2023 brings you and your organization what you need and look forward to a new year of fostering connections across our culturally diverse world.
Sincerely,
Team LCW
